column4: Is there a known issue with azureus crashing immediately after startup?

for that versin of azureus i just make sure i have latest java and icedtea and then i download vuze tarball, extract to usr/share and run the script to start it up, i made shortcuts to that script for start menu
if that doesnt work you can probably ask azureus team for help since they support linux, also try earlier version that is in synaptic for azureus which is 2.4
